title: 5 injured during shooting at Murfreesboro party
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
MURFREESBORO, Tenn. (WKRN) – Five people were injured, one seriously, in a shooting at a party in Rutherford County early Sunday morning.
It happened at a residence in the 1900 block of Old Castle Drive around 1 a.m.
Murfreesboro police reported a fight had broken out during a party and multiple people were shot.
Witnesses told News 2 as many as 100 people attended the party.
One person was seriously injured. All five victims were transported to Saint Thomas Rutherford Hospital.
The Murfreesboro Violent Crimes Unit is investigating the shooting.
No suspect description was immediately released.
Anyone with information is asked to contact Murfreesboro police at 615-893-1311.
